lines.text: That <c=#0000FF>Living Memory</c> spell- if the <c=#0000FF>Stop Wizard's</c> a dead lump of rock, how's it still there?
What's the spellbook say? Is it a spell that ends when the caster dies?
Well, it says two hours. Nothing about the caster.
But- I mean, a lot of spells, you can just assume that!
But you don't know for sure if this spell is like that, right?
...Yeah, I guess that wouldn't really hold up in court.
